signatures.name: len(string) integer
signatures.doc: Gets the length of string argument. Returns integer value.

arguments.doc: String value to get length of.

signatures.name: contains(string, string) boolean
signatures.doc: Gets if second string argument contains in first string argument. Returns boolean value.

signatures.name: substring(string, integer, integer) string
signatures.doc: Gets substring of first argument in range of last arguments. Returns string value.

arguments.doc: String value to get substring from.
Integer value, left index of substring.
Integer value, right index of substring.

signatures.name: replaceAll(string, string, string) string
signatures.doc: Replaces all occurrences of the second argument in the first argument with the third argument. Returns string value of replaced string.

signatures.name: index(string, string) integer
signatures.doc: Gets first index of second argument in first argument. Returns integer value, index of occurrence or -1 if substring is not found.

signatures.name: lastIndex(string, string) integer
signatures.doc: Gets last index of second argument in first argument. Returns integer value, index of occurrence or -1 if substring is not found.

signatures.name: encodeUri(string) string
signatures.doc: Translates a string into application/x-www-form-urlencoded format using a specific encoding scheme. Returns string value, encoded string.

signatures.name: decodeUri(string) string
signatures.doc: Decodes a application/x-www-form-urlencoded string using a specific encoding scheme. Returns string value, decoded string.

signatures.name: trim(string) string
signatures.doc: Returns a string having leading and trailing whitespace removed.

signatures.name: trimLeft(string) string
signatures.doc: Returns a string having leading whitespace removed.

signatures.name: trimRight(string) string
signatures.doc: Returns a string having trailing whitespace removed.

signatures.name: toUpperCase(string) string
signatures.doc: Returns converted to upper case string.

signatures.name: toLowerCase(string) string
signatures.doc: Returns converted to lower case string.

signatures.name: padStart(val: string, len: integer, pad_str: string) string
signatures.doc: Pads a string to a given string length, inserting at start

signatures.name: padStart(val: integer, len: integer, pad_str: string) string
signatures.doc: Converts given integer to a string and pads it to a given string length, inserting at start

signatures.name: padEnd(val: string, len: integer, pad_str: string) string
signatures.doc: Pads a string to a given string length, inserting at end

signatures.name: padEnd(val: integer, len: integer, pad_str: string) string
signatures.doc: Converts given integer to a string and pads it to a given string length, inserting at end

signatures.name: testRegex(str: string, regex: string) boolean
signatures.doc: Checks whether the string matches the regular expression.

signatures.name: encodeRegex(str: string) string
signatures.doc: Encodes a string for safe use in regular expressions.
